# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

add_subdirectory(MCTargetDesc)
add_subdirectory(TargetInfo)

add_library(lib-Target-NVPTX)


target_compile_options(lib-Target-NVPTX PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(lib-Target-NVPTX PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX
)

target_link_libraries(lib-Target-NVPTX PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  contrib-libs-llvm18
  libs-llvm18-include
  llvm18-lib-Analysis
  llvm18-lib-CodeGen
  lib-CodeGen-AsmPrinter
  lib-CodeGen-LowLevelType
  lib-CodeGen-SelectionDAG
  llvm18-lib-IR
  llvm18-lib-MC
  llvm18-lib-Support
  llvm18-lib-Target
  Target-NVPTX-MCTargetDesc
  Target-NVPTX-TargetInfo
  llvm18-lib-TargetParser
  lib-Transforms-IPO
  lib-Transforms-Scalar
  lib-Transforms-Utils
  lib-Transforms-Vectorize
)

target_sources(lib-Target-NVPTX PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXAliasAnalysis.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXAllocaHoisting.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXAsmPrinter.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXFrameLowering.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXGenericToNVVM.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXISelDAGToDAG.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXISelLowering.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXImageOptimizer.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXLowerAlloca.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXPrologEpilogPass.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXProxyRegErasure.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/llvm18/lib/Target/NVPTX/NVPTXRegisterInfo.cpp

)
